citation: Proclamation under the Wills Amendment (International Wills) Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Wills Amendment (International Wills) Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Wills Amendment (International Wills) Act 2012 fix 11 March 2015 as the day on which that Act commences.

16 December 2014

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

DR. VANESSA GOODWIN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 December 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
